title: Outdoor Fireplace w/ Lounge Seating, Friendly Onsite Management
map_address: 5474 Oakley Industrial Blvd near Senoia Rd
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 751 Sq.
Discover an unrivaled living experience at The Parke at Oakley, where contemporary style meets condominium-quality finishes.
In each sprawling one, two, and three bedroom pet-friendly apartment, you’ll find a flexible floor plan that features modern perks, a clean color palette, and a comfortable layout.
Upgrade your modern living experience in Fairburn, Georgia, when you become a resident of The Parke at Oakley.

From our ideal location near the I-85, sitting just outside Atlanta, to our appealing community amenities, like the onsite car care center and zero entry swimming pool, The Parke at Oakley offers an upscale retreat you’ll be proud to call home.

Hardwood-Inspired Plank Flooring*, Designer Cabinetry w/ Brushed Nickel Pulls*, 2-Inch Faux Wood Window Coverings, Crown Molding, Spacious Sunroom, Pet-Friendly 1, 2 & 3 Bedroom Homes, Private Patio or Balcony w/ Outdoor Storage, Garden Tub, Updated Gourmet Kitchen*, Expansive Walk-In Closets, Laundry Room w/ Washer & Dryer Connections, Sleek Black Appliances*, Premium Lighting & Plumbing Fixtures*, 9-Foot Ceilings, Ceiling Fans, Newly Refinished Countertops*

Complimentary WiFi at Pool, Clubhouse & Fitness Center, Zero Entry Resort-Style Swimming Pool, Friendly Onsite Management, Online Rental Payments, Newly Renovated 24-Hour Fitness Center, Outdoor Fireplace w/ Lounge Seating, Private Outdoor Playground, Private Bark Park w/ Agility Equipment, Picnic Areas & Barbecue Grilling Stations, Rentable Storage Units, Brand-New, Luxurious Clubhouse, Detached Garage Parking Options, Outdoor Sundeck w/ Lounge Furniture, Car Care Center w/ Complimentary Vacuum, Outstanding School District, Gated Access Community, Executive Business Center
Please contact our leasing team to learn more about our restricted breed list and applicable fees and deposits.
We look forward to welcoming both you and your pets to our community!
